solution_line_template: There are {tulips}+{daisies}=<<{tulips}+{daisies}={not_roses}>>{not_roses} flowers that are not roses.
Therefore, ({not_roses}/{total_flowers})*{percent_multiplier}=<<({not_roses}/{total_flowers})*{percent_multiplier}={percent_not_roses}>>{percent_not_roses}% of the flowers are not roses.
